Founder & Chief Growth Strategist | Rocket Strategy

I had the opportunity to both manage Jesse directly and collaborate with him on group initiatives when we worked together at ZIVELO. Jesse is a rare individual who exudes passion and enthusiasm both toward the company and his work but also toward creating a fun team environment. Jesse is quick to get up to speed on strategies and has an ability to rapidly execute his work unlike anyone I have ever seen. Don't let Jesse's young age fool you - he knows what it takes to make things happen in business and he's usually doing it before you even think to ask him. I chose Jesse to take over some of my highest level responsibilities before I left ZIVELO because I trusted him to maintain a high standard of work when I was gone. I would recommend Jesse for any sales and marketing operations roles.

Family man, Businessman, Entrepreneur, these are all words I word use to describe Jesse Hallock. Having had the privilege of working closely with Jesse here at ZIVELO™, I have come to see his knowledge and experience shine through on a variety of projects. His high energy sprit and dynamic personality bring a new level of vitality to the business development and marketing departments here at the office. His keen business sense coupled with an artful eye for design and creative development makes Jesse an invaluable asset to any company or corporation both here in the United States and internationally as well. His willingness to learn and unwavering dedication to the task at hand has allowed Jesse to dissolve cultural barriers and solidify several multi-million dollar contracts and partnerships both in his past and working here at ZIVELO. Without a doubt I can tell you that wherever Jesse decides to go, both in business and in life, success is sure to follow.

This past year I had the opportunity to work side by side with Fadi. Infusionsoft had never hired Sales leadership externally prior to hiring Fadi. He entered the company with a passion and enthusiasm to win. He was a quick learner and handled the adversity and change very well. I love that he is not a "yes man" he isn't afraid to get his hands dirty and challenges the status quo. His impact and leadership effectively raised the bar and in his final month here his team was 145% of quota and one of his reps set a new sales record at Infusionsoft. He is a natural servant leader and would excel in just about any sales leadership role.

summary: I am a Regional Sales Manager at Infusionsoft – The leader in sales and marketing software for small businesses. We are dedicated to a single purpose: Helping small businesses succeed. Infusionsoft has worked with over 40,000 customers to grow their businesses by enabling their sales and marketing capabilities. 100,000+ users rely on their Infusionsoft solution to drive business growth with automated marketing and advanced CRM capabilities customized to their business. I consistently show clients how they can automate their marketing, attract more customers, and grow sales while saving massive amounts of time. HOW INFUSIONSOFT HELPS SMALL BUSINESSES SUCCEED•	Attract Customers•	Automate Marketing•	Close Sales•	Sell Online•	Scale the Business•	Draw Traffic to Websites•	Capture more Leads•	Nurture Prospects•	Deliver Customer SatisfactionSPECIALTIES:•	Software Solutions•	Business Planning and Development•	Direct and Channel Strategies•	Retail and Distribution•	Marketing Automation (RPM)•	Internet Marketing•	CRM Software•	Ecommerce Software•	SAASIn my heart I am a versatile, passionate, and visionary individual. I find my home at creating, developing and seeing results. The "standard"​ is not good enough for me. I always strive to raise the bar, do what "cannot"​ be done, and unlock opportunities that entire industries have missed.I am driven to create powerful change, and industrious growth, and thrive in moments of opposition. I want to give back to the world, and create change in underdeveloped nations and areas of severe poverty. Making somebody smile, and feel happiness through service is important in my life's work.For those reaching out about questions regarding Ghost Armor I have sold my ownership. If you have any questions please call the Ghost Armor World Headquarters @ (480)921-3161
name: Jesse Hallock
